name: Catchess - A Catlike Chess Puzzle
description:
Theme of Unog Fall Jam 2021 - "Catlike". For us cats are beyond pysical space and they are totally odd creatures.

This is a story of a stalker cat that chases you wherever you go and whenever you don't look at it. Only way to distract it coming after you is either directly looking at the cat or throwing some veggies at it to play few seconds.

How to Play:

1- WASD to move in available directions.

2- Use Mouse position to adjust the direction you look.

3- Use Mouse to place objects that you've grabbed.

Repeat Step 1 & 2 & 3

Notes: Assets that used in this project by

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

https://umoral.itch.io/isometric-room

https://jordizzle.itch.io/farming-game-asset-pack-1

https://opengameart.org/content/30-drag-rotate-move-cursors

https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops
